mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_enabled = 1
mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_password, member_name, member_address, member_address2, member_phone) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberAddress2}, #{memberPhone})
mapper.delete: delete from address where member_id = #{memberId} and address_no = #{addressNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from stock_notice where member_id = #{memberId} and food_no = #{foodNo}

select * from( select sn.member_id, sn.food_no, m.member_phone, fs.food_section_name, (select count(*) from market_order mo left join market_order_detail mod on mo.market_order_no = mod.market_order_no where mod.food_no = sn.food_no and mo.market_order_date > sn.notice_date and mo.market_order_flag = 1) flag from stock_notice sn left join member m on sn.member_id = m.member_id left join food f on sn.food_no = f.food_no left join food_section fs on f.food_section_no = fs.food_section_no) where flag > 0
